title: The Capture of the USS Pueblo
description:
When North Korea and the US came close to war in 1968; plus  Salvador Dali, re-creating Francis Bacon's studio, the first veggie burger and the origins of Lego

Photo: Members of the USS Pueblo's crew being taken into custody. Credit: Korean Central News Agency/Korea News Service
itunes:subtitle: When North Korea and the US came close to war; plus Salvador Dali, the origins of Lego
